title: Sokoľany
text:
Sokoľany is a <a href="village">village</a> and <a href="municipality">municipality</a> in <a href="Ko%C5%A1ice-okolie%20District">Košice-okolie District</a> in the <a href="Ko%C5%A1ice%20Region">Košice Region</a> of eastern <a href="Slovakia">Slovakia</a>.
History.
In <a href="history">historical records</a> the village was first mentioned in 1251.
Geography.
The <a href="village">village</a> lies at an <a href="altitude">altitude</a> of 210 metres and covers an <a href="area">area</a> of 3.858 km².
It has a <a href="population">population</a> of about 1120 people.
Ethnicity.
The <a href="population">population</a> is almost entirely <a href="Slovaks">Slovak</a> in <a href="ethnicity">ethnicity</a>.
Government.
The village relies on the <a href="tax">tax</a> and <a href="district">district</a> offices and <a href="fire%20brigade">fire brigade</a> at <a href="Ko%C5%A1ice">Košice</a>.
Culture.
The village has a public <a href="library">library</a> and is connected to <a href="cable%20television">cable television</a>. It has a food store.
Sport.
The village has a <a href="Association%20football">football</a> pitch and a <a href="gym">gym</a>nasium.
Transport.
The nearest <a href="railway%20station">railway station</a> is located 1 kilometre away.
